config_part.ioc_desc: Oxford Instruments ITC503/Heliox based cryogenic refrigerator

macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 2.

macro.name: SORB_SENSOR
macro.description: The sensor corresponding to the sorb.

macro.name: HE3POTHI_SENSOR
macro.description: The sensor corresponding to the the He3 Pot at high temperatures.

macro.name: 1KPOTHE3POTLO_SENSOR
macro.description: The corresponding to the the 1K Pot/He3 Pot at low temperatures.

macro.name: SORB_CHANNEL
macro.description: The channel to use when controlling the sorb.

macro.name: HE3POTHI_CHANNEL
macro.description: The channel to use when controlling the He3Pot at high temperatures.

macro.name: 1KPOTHE3POTLO_CHANNEL
macro.description: The channel to use when controlling the 1K Pot/He3Pot at low temperatures.

macro.name: DEFAULT_POST_CONDENSE_TEMP_SETPOINT
macro.description: The default temperature setpoint to set just after a recondense

macro.name: RECONDENSE_SORB_TEMP_SET
macro.description: The temperature setpoint to set for the sorb in a recondense

macro.name: RECONDENSE_SORB_P
macro.description: The proportional to set for the sorb in a recodense

macro.name: RECONDENSE_SORB_I
macro.description: The integral to set for the sorb in a recodense

macro.name: RECONDENSE_SORB_D
macro.description: The derivative to set for the sorb in a recodense

macro.name: RECONDENSE_SORB_TEMP_FINAL
macro.description: The final temperature of the sorb to wait for in part 3

macro.name: RECONDENSE_HE3POT_TARGET_TEMP_PART1
macro.description: The target temperature of the He3Pot to wait for in part 1

macro.name: RECONDENSE_HE3POT_TARGET_TEMP_PART2
macro.description: The target temperature of the He3Pot to wait for in part 2

macro.name: RECONDENSE_POST_PART2_WAIT_TIME
macro.description: The time in seconds to wait after part 2 of a recondense

macro.name: RECONDENSE_PART_TIMEOUT
macro.description: The time to wait before timing out a part in a recondense.

macro.name: RECONDENSE_PART_TIMEOUT_ON
macro.description: Whether to timeout parts of the recondense.

macro.name: MAX_TEMP_FOR_HE3_COOLING
macro.description: The temperature below which He3 cooling is to be used.

macro.name: SENSOR_SWITCHING_THRESHOLD
macro.description: The temperature threshold to switch between hi and lo sensors.

macro.name: MAX_OPERATING_TEMP_FOR_HELIOX
macro.description: The maximum temperature at which the heliox can be operated at.
